definition: to comfort/to console/to stroke/to caress/an old term for province or provincial governor
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: To be served in distress is to be caressed.
sentences.chinese: 在那種痛苦中，有人服侍，便是有人撫愛。

sentences.english: Her mother's loving caress comforted the sobbing girl.
sentences.chinese: 她母親的撫愛安慰了那個哽咽着的女孩。

sentences.english: You go to live in a big city and have your english girl there to cuddle you .
sentences.chinese: 你去住在一個大城市裏，還有你那位英國姑娘撫愛你。

sentences.english: Youll remember the sweetness of our caresses.
sentences.chinese: 你又想起那撫愛的溫存。

sentences.english: I will not remain aloof and indifferent when you pet me.
sentences.chinese: 我不會在您撫愛我時顯得清高和冷漠。
